title: lobehub/lobe-chat
summary: 🤯 LobeHub - an open-source, modern design AI Agent Workspace. Supports multiple AI providers, Knowledge Base (file upload / RAG ), one click install MCP Marketplace and Artifacts / Thinking. One-click FREE deployment of your private AI Agent application.

title: MandalAutomations/Ollama-Devcontainer
summary: This project provides a ready-to-use development environment for Python projects with integrated LLM (Language Model) capabilities using Ollama. It includes a pre-configured VS Code Dev Container setup with Docker Compose, a Python 3.10 environment, and example code for interacting with Ollama models.

title: namel3ss-Ai/namel3ss
summary: English-first, AI-native programming language built from the ground up to support AI.

title: agents-flex/agents-flex
summary: Agents-Flex is an elegant LLM Application Framework like LangChain with Java.

title: LearningCircuit/local-deep-research
summary: Local Deep Research achieves ~95% on SimpleQA benchmark (tested with GPT-4.1-mini). Supports local and cloud LLMs (Ollama, Google, Anthropic, ...). Searches 10+ sources - arXiv, PubMed, web, and your private documents. Everything Local & Encrypted.

title: jakbuczarnecki/intergrax
summary: A modular AI framework focused on LLM orchestration, retrieval-augmented generation (RAG), web search, agent workflows, and multimodal processing — designed for real-world automation and integration.

title: 1Panel-dev/MaxKB
summary: 🔥 MaxKB is an open-source platform for building enterprise-grade agents.  强大易用的开源企业级智能体平台。

title: RunanywhereAI/runanywhere-sdks
summary: Production ready toolkit to run AI locally

title: 1Panel-dev/1Panel
summary: 🔥 1Panel provides an intuitive web interface and MCP Server to manage websites, files, containers, databases, and LLMs on a Linux server.

title: TaluCraft/deep-research
summary: 🔍 Explore complex questions using recursive AI agents, uncovering insights through structured inquiry and synthesis to deliver comprehensive answers.

title: ore-00/librechat-dashboard
summary: 🚀 Set up and manage LibreChat locally on CachyOS (Arch Linux) with a comprehensive dashboard and real-time monitoring for enhanced productivity.

title: marcossangomes/SmartLLM-Router
summary: 🔍 Optimize LLM requests by routing them to the best models, while leveraging semantic caching and real-time cost analytics for efficient resource use.

title: afterthings7/local-ai-stack
summary: 🔍 Build local AI infrastructure on M2 MacBook Air with zero cloud dependencies, ensuring unlimited usage and complete privacy.

title: Namanpaliyal/KardiaFlow
summary: 🚀 Build and deploy a lightweight RAG demo using FastAPI, Chroma, and Ollama LLM for efficient AI-assisted information retrieval.

title: arq105/llm-speech-summarization
summary: 📘 Summarize speeches and documents swiftly with advanced techniques using LangChain and Groq's fast Llama models for efficient content insights.

title: redblac/web-youtube-summarizer-llm
summary: 📝 Summarize any YouTube video or website URL effortlessly using LangChain and Groq Llama models for clear, concise insights.

title: franck-bedis/langchain-sql-agent
summary: 📊 Chat with your SQL database using LangChain and Groq LLaMA 3.1. Easily ask questions and get instant answers with auto-generated SQL queries.
